meanings.sent1: I am rewaxing my surfboard to make it shiny.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys rewaxing her car to protect the paint.
meanings.sent3: After rewaxing the floor, it looked like a mirror!
meanings.sent4: The gardener rewaxing the leaves made them glisten in the sun.
meanings.sent5: Rewaxing the furniture brought out its natural beauty.

meanings.sent1: Rewaxing is necessary to maintain the boat's hull.
meanings.sent2: I bought a kit for rewaxing my skis before the season.
meanings.sent3: The rewaxing of the candles made them burn brighter.
meanings.sent4: The rewaxing of the surfboards was like a ritual before the competition.
meanings.sent5: The rewaxing of the floors left a pleasant scent in the room.
